name: Legends of Gensokyo
description:
Controls

[W][A][S][D] - Movement
[M] - Back to the main menu without saving.

Citations

Patrick

- Scene Transitions are based on the code from (5319) How to make AWESOME Scene Transitions in Unity! - YouTube by Brackeys Enemy

- player sprites are from the Touhou franchise created by ZUN Battle

- music is from the Touhou franchise created by ZUN

- Inventory and item system were built from Joss Moo-Young’s lab4 video and midterm

- The battle scene layout and background is inspired by Earthbound Enemies sharing different battle thems was also inspired by earthbound

Mohammed

-

Helped with Lambda Expressions

- Used the Sound manager that Tom Tsiliopoulos Taught us in class.

- Used the button ability that I used in Ex 5

- I got inspiration from Tom Tsiliopoulos for the PlayerAnimationState Enum.
